ComicInfo.Characters: Alex Hayden,Taskmaster,Constrictor [Frank Schlichting],Wizard [Bentley Wittman],Mr. Wilson (Wade's father?),General Esteban,Vanessa],Titania [Copycat (revealed that she's been impersonating Titania the whole time),Deadpool [Wade Wilson]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:41:43 [Issue ID 4000-106459] urn:comicvine:4000-106459 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:03:41. [Issue ID 89604]
ComicInfo.Summary: Why is Constrictor trying to kill Deadpool? Is Titania really who she says she is? And will Loki's curse ever be lifted from the head of Wade Wilson? All of these questions and more are answered here! Deadpool returns from Wakanda. Titania and Frank are captured by the Avengers (thanks to help from the Black Panther and Deadpool himself) while imprisoned Titania reveals that she is really Copycat, Deadpool's old girlfriend Vanessa. She escapes to try to surprise Deadpool but it was he that suprised her by saying he always knew. Later Deadpool goes to a bar and almost gets into a bar fight with an old man. After words he's walking home and on his way discovers a shocking revelation.
ComicInfo.Title: Johnny Handsome Bites the Dust (or: If This Slip Be Pink...!)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
